name: Face Detection Application
description: A project that accepts image link and marks face area on image using Clarifai's face-detection model

name: Tic Tac Toe Game With AI Player
description: A Tic-Tac-Toe game that features a board where players can make moves, and an AI (using the Minimax algorithm) that can play against the user.

name: GitHub Snoop
description: A web app that allows users to explore detailed GitHub profiles by entering a username, providing insights into repositories, followers, starred projects, organizations, and more.

name: Real-Time-Chat Application
description: A real time chat application built using SCSS, TailwindCSS, React.js, and Firebase

name: AuthXpress
description: A robust and secure authentication system designed for modern web applications.

name: Developers Quiz App
description: A quiz app that scores users and correct them on wrong answers

name: Kepler Exoplanet Explorer
description: An interactive web app designed to explore exoplanetary data visually and analytically. Features dynamic charts, searchable and filterable exoplanet database, and a habitability checker

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A simple game to learn and practice basic functionalities in React
